snippet: The Seattle Police Department might cancel plans to outfit officers with body cameras because the ensuing public record requests for the videos might become too costly for the city, according to a report published Thursday....

headline.print_headline: Seattle Police May Scrap Body Camera Plan Over Costly Record Requests
headline.main: Seattle Police May Scrap Body Camera Plan Over Costly Record Requests

lead_paragraph: The Seattle Police Department might cancel plans to outfit officers with body cameras because the ensuing public record requests for the videos might become too costly for the city, according to a report published Thursday.
